pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantā addasaṃsu chagalakaṃ ajikāya vippaṭipajjantaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.4: “handa mayaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ chagalakaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karoma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.5: Imaṃ ajikaṃ mettiyaṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ karoma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.7: Pubbe mayaṃ, āvuso, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ sutena avocumhā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.8: Idāni pana amhehi sāmaṃ diṭṭho mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.9: Te taṃ chagalakaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma akaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.10: Taṃ ajikaṃ mettiyaṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ akaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.12: “pubbe mayaṃ, āvuso, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ sutena avocumhā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.13: Idāni pana amhehi sāmaṃ diṭṭho mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.17: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.18: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.19: “sarasi tvaṃ, dabba, evarūpaṃ kattā yathayime bhikkhū āhaṃsū”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.22: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.23: “sarasi tvaṃ, dabba, evarūpaṃ kattā yathayime bhikkhū āhaṃsū”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.28: “Yato ahaṃ, bhante, jāto nābhijānāmi supinantenapi methunadhammaṃ paṭisevitā, pageva jāgaro”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.29: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi—“tena hi, bhikkhave, ime bhikkhū anuyuñjathā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.30: Idaṃ vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū anuyuñjiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.2: Te bhikkhūhi anuyuñjīyamānā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.3: “kiṃ pana tumhe, āvuso, āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.5: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.7: “kathañhi nāma mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.8: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.9: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.12: “kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.13: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.15: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ duṭṭho doso appatīto aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya— ‘appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyan’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.17: Tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā aññabhāgiyañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti koci deso lesamatto upādinno, bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti, saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.1.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.1.11: tena ca kopena, tena ca dosena, tāya ca anattamanatāya, tāya ca anabhiraddhiyā appatīto hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.12: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇassa siyā tabbhāgiyaṃ siyā aññabhāgiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.3: leso nāma dasa lesā— jātileso, nāmaleso, gottaleso, liṅgaleso, āpattileso, pattaleso, cīvaraleso, upajjhāyaleso, ācariyaleso, senāsanaleso.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.6: khattiyo diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.11: natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṃghakammaṃ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.19: Pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi, assamaṇosi, asakyaputtiyosi … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.24: saṃgharakkhito diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.27: Pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi, assamaṇosi, asakyaputtiyosi … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.33: vāsiṭṭho diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.36: Pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi, assamaṇosi, asakyaputtiyosi … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.42: odāto diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.45: Pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi, assamaṇosi, asakyaputtiyosi … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.55: sumbhakapattadharo diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.58: Pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi, assamaṇosi, asakyaputtiyosi … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.62: gahapaticīvaradharo diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.65: Pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi, assamaṇosi, asakyaputtiyosi … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.68: itthannāmassa saddhivihāriko diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.71: Pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi, assamaṇosi, asakyaputtiyosi … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.74: itthannāmassa antevāsiko diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.77: Pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi, assamaṇosi, asakyaputtiyosi … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.80: itthannāmasenāsanavāsiko diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.85: natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṃghakammaṃ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.5: Appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyanti
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.6: bhikkhubhāvā cāveyyaṃ, samaṇadhammā cāveyyaṃ, sīlakkhandhā cāveyyaṃ, tapoguṇā cāveyyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.8: yasmiṃ khaṇe anuddhaṃsito hoti, taṃ khaṇaṃ taṃ layaṃ taṃ muhuttaṃ vītivatte.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.10: yena vatthunā anuddhaṃsito hoti tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ samanuggāhīyamāno.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.14: cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.17: tesaṃ lesānaṃ aññataro leso upādinno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.19: tucchakaṃ mayā bhaṇitaṃ, musā mayā bhaṇitaṃ, abhūtaṃ mayā bhaṇitaṃ, ajānantena mayā bhaṇitaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.1: Bhikkhu saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, saṃghādisese saṃghādisesadiṭṭhi hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.4: natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṃghakammaṃ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.5: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.6: Bhikkhu saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, saṃghādisese thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.13: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.14: Bhikkhu thullaccayaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti thullaccaye thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.22: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.26: dubbhāsitaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, dubbhāsite dubbhāsitadiṭṭhi hoti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.34: natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṃghakammaṃ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.35: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.1: Bhikkhu saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti saṃghādisese saṃghādisesadiṭṭhi hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.4: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.5: Bhikkhu saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, saṃghādisese thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.12: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.13: Bhikkhu thullaccayaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti thullaccaye thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.21: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.25: dubbhāsitaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti dubbhāsite dubbhāsitadiṭṭhi hoti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.33: natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṃghakammaṃ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.34: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṃghādisesassa.
